content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10.5, 34.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (10.5, 34.5)
- Boiler at position (5.5, 27.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
- Small Electric Poles connecting the steam engine to the electricity network

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (15.0, 0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
- Inserters at positions (17.5, 0.5) and (16.5, 0.5) connecting the furnace and chest

### Water Supply System
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at position (0.5, 30.5)
- Pipe network connecting the offshore pump to various entities

### Pipe Networks
Multiple PipeGroups connecting various entities, including:
- PipeGroup at position (-14.5, 14.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-14.5, 17.5) with water
- PipeGroup at position (-12.5, 18.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-11.5, 19.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-9.5, 23.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-7.5, 24.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-3.5, 24.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-5.5, 26.5)
- PipeGroup at position (1.5, 29.5) with water
- PipeGroup at position (5.5, 31.5)
- PipeGroup at position (8.5, 34.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler
- Ensure that the pipes and underground pipes are correctly aligned and connected between the offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) and the boiler at position (5.5, 27.0).

### Errors When Placing Entities Too Far
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum placement distance is 10 units.

### Errors When Placing Entities on Occupied Tiles
- Verify that the target tile is unoccupied before placing an entity. Avoid placing entities where the footprint overlaps with water or other obstacles.
